assignments.title: Data Cleaning and Exploration
assignments.description: Perform data cleaning and exploratory data analysis (EDA) on the given dataset using Python libraries such as pandas, numpy, and matplotlib. Submit your findings as a Jupyter Notebook file.

assignments.title: Machine Learning Model Evaluation
assignments.description: Train a classification model on the provided dataset and evaluate its performance using accuracy, precision, recall, and F1-score. Submit the report and code files.
